purpose: Render the case corpus table with expandable rows showing case detail (source, dollar amount, quality tags). Read-only view — no async operations.
Render a matrix visualization showing which qualities appear in which policies. Cross-reference view — no async operations, no expand/collapse.
Render the main dashboard with pipeline status, metrics cards, high-risk table, and pipeline controls. Entry point view with async operations (run/seed pipeline).
Render detection patterns organized in a 3-level hierarchy: exploitation trees → steps → patterns. Multi-level expand/collapse with filtering by priority.
Render policy catalog as a tree with expandable policy nodes showing scored qualities and scanned programs. Split-view layout.
Render exploitation tree predictions organized as expandable tree panels with nested step nodes and confidence scores.
Render enforcement source registry with CRUD operations — add source form, document upload, source deletion. Async operations via useAsyncAction.
Render vulnerability taxonomy as a grid of quality cards with expandable detail showing matched cases. Single-expand selection pattern.
Top-level app component handling authentication flow (Cognito), API gate (initial data load), and routing via react-router-dom.
Render dimension registry with searchable grid of dimension cards showing scores and quality associations. Read-only view with fetch-on-mount.
Render source discovery workflow — feed management, candidate review, and acceptance. Async operations via useAsyncAction for running feeds and reviewing candidates.
Render pipeline management dashboard — execution monitoring, run history, stop/delete operations. Admin view with multiple async operations.
Render deep research workflow — triage results, research session detail with findings and quality assessments. Async expand with data fetching.
Retrieve the current Cognito user session, returning the JWT ID token if authenticated or null if not. Used by apiGet/apiPost for Authorization headers.
Zustand selector hook that extracts the global error state from the pipeline store. Used by ApiGate for initial load error display.
Zustand selector hook that extracts the global loading state from the pipeline store. Used by ApiGate for initial load spinner.
Sign out the current Cognito user by clearing the session and revoking tokens. Called from Sidebar's sign-out button.
Always-on dual-rate polling hook for pipeline status. Polls GET /api/status at fast (3s) or slow (15s) rate depending on whether stages are running. Triggers dashboard refresh on data changes.
